      • addGlow

        public static org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack addGlow(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack itemStack)
        This will add a "glowing" effect onto an item. (An Enchant & Hide Enchant flag) This will not effect the original item!
        Parameters:
        itemStack - the ItemStack to add to
        Returns:
        the generated ItemStack
